name: Doom GTS
storyline:
DOOM GTS

-NEW HERO
-17 ways to attack
-FLASHLIGHT available on certain weapons
-2 VEHICLES for use as a weapon and transportation
-THRUSTER BOOTS for reaching those high places
-All new EPIC BOSS BATTLES
-New MONSTERS
-All new MAPS
-Unlockable DoomGuy and Duke Nukem bots to assist your play
-Higher Definition Graphics including 3D MODELS
-Cross-platform Music
summary:
The Grand Transitional Stages of Doom.

- Taking Doom's classic engine to the limits. Nostalgia, and everything a "Doomer" could desire (eg. a vehicle to mow down monsters, better bosses, better graphics), easter eggs included.
